main event: A civilian reported a sighting of a triangular-shaped unidentified flying object (UFO) with lights in Centerville, Ohio on April 22, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed for a duration of 10 minutes,The UFO had two green lights on the bottom and two amber lights on top,It moved eastward and seemed to follow an aircraft,There were 3 confirmed witnesses,The sky conditions were hazy with no moonlight at the time of the sighting.
